job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: The CompanybrbrMiso Robotics is transforming the restaurant industry and making a real impact on the worldbrbrMiso Robotics is writing an epic new story for the restaurant industry Weve developed a robotic kitchen assistant Flippy that can perform a variety of kitchen tasks including flipping burgers and running the deep fryer Our product is a robotic arm on a rail that fits into existing kitchens along existing cook lines and is designed to work with existing equipment alongside kitchen workers Under the hood Flippy relies on our platform which combines deep learning and other computer vision technologies with optimizationbased scheduling and nonlinear control to adapt quickly to a variety of kitchen workflows while achieving graceful and efficient motionbrbrThe challenge of bringing robotics into commercial kitchens requires many disciplines to come together The compositions of teams at Miso Robotics reflect this multidisciplinary nature of our work We have built a worldclass team and we are looking for more exceptional people to join us If you believe like we do that the future of the kitchen involves robotics and artificial intelligence HINT It definitely does and if you want to count yourself among the handful of lucky people whove found themselves with the opportunity to solve this problem then Miso Robotics might be the right place for youbrbrThe RolebrbrAs a Senior Software Engineer you will be responsible for designing and developing our kitchen automation framework and cloudconnected infrastructure which power Flippy You will perform hardcore coding debugging testing and troubleshooting throughout the development process You will use your expertise in software engineering to own the design prototype and commercialization of core software focused primarily on improving the experience for the users of our systems You will work closely with robotics specialists in design controls machine learning and computer vision to continuously evolve our architecture to support an everincreasing diversity of kitchen environments and tasks allowing Flippy to operate broadly throughout the restaurant industry You will also work to make our internal framework easier and easier to use requiring less and less training to usebrbrWhat Youll DobrbrstronguIn This Role You WillbrustrongulliDesign and develop computer software systems that are highly testableliliRead our code and documentation to understand our existing architecture and practicesliliTake on problems and research the solution space to find several reasonable solutionsliliCreate architectural diagrams which demonstrate flow of data through the systemliliIterate on code refactoring repeatedly to improve our software generalityliliCreate documentation to help identify and clarify functional requirementsliliReview code and architectural diagrams and provide helpful feedbackliliCreate unit tests and systemlevel tests to verify code functionalityliliCoordinate with hardware engineers and other staff to forecast whether the design will be feasible under cost and time constraintsliliPerform software systems testing with a focus on procedures and programmingliliPerforms other related duties as assignedbrliulWhat You Need in Order to Succeed in this RolebrbrTechnical RequirementsbrulliBachelors Degree in Computer Science Engineering Mathematics or related fieldlili4 years experience in developing general software frameworks in C Knowledge of template metaprogramming STL and concurrency is preferred but not requiredliliExperience developing testing and debugging liliExpertise in Linux MySQL and Git Experience with CMake and Docker is preferred but not requiredliliStrong understanding of OOP algorithms and data structures and software design patternsliliExperience with practices for a full software development cycle including agile development coding standards versioning code reviews and testingbrliulstronguOther RequirementsbrustrongulliSuperb oral and written communication skillsliliAbility to collaborate effectively with a teamliliAbility to adapt your coding style to our internal styleliliAbility to deliver productionready code in a timely fashionliliGreat at managing multiple tasks and getting stuff done in a fast paced environmentliliStrong attention to detail analytical skills and ability to learn at hyperspeedliliObsession with clarityliliProlonged periods sitting at a desk and working on a computerliliMust be able to lift up to 10 pounds at timesliliMust be able to work at our HQ location in Pasadena CAbrliulBenefits and PerksbrulliUnlimited PTO policyliliComprehensive benefits offeringslili401K planliliEducation reimbursement programliliCompetitive payliliAdvancement opportunitiesliul
